## common.Api.init() method

Initializes a session for communication with Smokeball. Also sets the session context.

The matterId is set in the context when initialized in a matter window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
init(request?: InitRequest): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [InitRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.common.initrequest.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
